recipeInstructions.text: In a large mixing bowl, add together the dry ingredients (oatmeal, flax seed, chocolate chips). Mix together.
Add in peanut butter, honey, and vanilla. Mix together thoroughly. Refrigerate to make your dough a bit firmer.
Roll bits of dough into 1 inch balls. Place in an air tight container and store in the refrigerator. They can be stored for up to one week.
